description:
Poshmark is the leading marketplace to buy and sell fashion. Shop your favorite brands at up to 70% off retail! List an item for sale in less than 60 seconds.

Shop. Sell. Style. Party.

SHOP
Whatever you’re shopping for, Poshmark’s got it – and for much less than at discount clothing retailers and outlets like Nordstrom Rack and TJ Maxx. With over a million dollars worth of new and gently used items added to the marketplace every single day, you will find amazing fashion finds from the hottest brands like Louis Vuitton, Michael Kors, Ugg Boots, J.Crew, Brandy Melville, and more! 

SELL: CONSIGN YOUR OWN CLOSET
Do you have items in your closet that didn't work out? Got a designer handbag, statement shoes, maybe even your old wedding dress you wore once and probably won’t ever wear again? Poshmark is the number 1 online consignment solution for a girl to sell her unwanted clothing in order to buy new things she’s coveting, providing an alternative to Goodwill and consignment stores like Buffalo Exchange.

STYLE:
Need ideas for what to wear to your next date or wedding? Do you hate getting dressed in the morning? Poshmark has millions of outfit of ideas for you. Shop the looks and closets of other Poshers today!

PARTY
Party on the go, no matter where you’re at! Join thousands of girls who are coming together three times a day, seven days a week at our themed virtual Posh Parties! Create new listings, share and shop together! Have Tory Burch, Forever 21, or Zara on the brain? There’s a party for you.

“I'm obsessed with the shopping app Poshmark.” - Refinery 29

“I have saved so much money shopping on Poshmark, I don’t think I’ll ever pay full retail again.” - Caroline, a Poshmark user

“It was such a hassle dropping clothes off to Goodwill and other consignment shops, plus who wants to throw out a perfectly good purse that you know another woman will LOVE?” - Crystal, a Poshmark user

"I tried Vinted, Threadflip, and Thredup, but nothing sold -- girls on those apps don’t want to spend much.. On Posh, on the other hand, there are so many eager girls ready to shop my closet!” - Justine, a Poshmark User

Don’t waste another precious minute with other discount fashion retailers or consignment solutions. Poshmark will change the way you shop for clothing and fashion. Try us out today!
releaseNotes:
MY LIKES FILTER
Looking for that perfect party dress and remember adding one to your my likes a month ago? Find it easily with new filter options on the "My Likes" page.

NEW JUST IN AND PRICE DROP TABS
Shop brands and showrooms by newly added items or recently discounted items. 

BUG FIXES
Various bug fixes and performance optimizations including a fix for an issue creating black borders on cropped images.
